channel.title: Coachella 2014
channel.description: Anybody going to coachella next week? It'll be my first time to cali and 2nd plane trip ever. Im stoked not only for that but for the music itself! Big acts that will be there that i enjoy most- Bonobo, broken bells, Nas, Outkast, strfkr, lorde, and sooo many more.

item.title: Coachella 2014
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:6, topic:541856”][quote author=Docent link=topic=660724.msg4417469#msg4417469 date=1396619165]

You’re going on a plane to go see a concert in which the audience is full of potheads and LSD users?

Are there other concerts that aren’t country?

I don’t understand what you’re asking.
[/quote]
Are there any concerts that do not pertain to the Country genre at which the audience is not primarily drug users[/quote]

I don’t think so.

Read full topic

item.title: Coachella 2014
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Docent:

You’re going on a plane to go see a concert in which the audience is full of potheads and LSD users?

fuck off

Anyways, wish I could go but school gets in the way, and I’d rather attend California for a bit longer then just the weekend. I know for sure I’ll end up at EDC NY(or mysteryland)/governers ball so I’ll still see the summer-festival artists. If I can get a group of friends for bonnaroo, I’d love to do that as well.

Read full topic
